variable.name: subid
variable.description: Child's project ID

variable.name: stq1
variable.description: Is considerate of other people's feelings

variable.name: stq2
variable.description: Is restless, overactive, cannot stay still for long

variable.name: stq3
variable.description: Often complains of headaches, stomach aches or sickness

variable.name: stq4
variable.description: Shares readily with other children (treats, toys, pencils etc.)

variable.name: stq5
variable.description: Often has temper tantrums or hot tempers

variable.name: stq6
variable.description: Is rather solitary, tends to play alone

variable.name: stq7
variable.description: Generally obedient, usually does what adults request

variable.name: stq8
variable.description: Has many worries, often seems worried

variable.name: stq9
variable.description: Helpful if someone is hurt, upset or feeling ill

variable.name: stq10
variable.description: Is constantly fidgeting or squirming

variable.name: stq11
variable.description: Has at least one good friend

variable.name: stq12
variable.description: Often fights with other children or bullies them

variable.name: stq13
variable.description: Is often unhappy, down-hearted or tearful

variable.name: stq14
variable.description: Is generally liked by other children

variable.name: stq15
variable.description: Is easily distracted, concentration wanders

variable.name: stq16
variable.description: Is nervous or clingy in new situations, easily loses confidence

variable.name: stq17
variable.description: Is kind to younger children

variable.name: stq18
variable.description: Often lies or cheats

variable.name: stq19
variable.description: Picked on or bullied by other children

variable.name: stq20
variable.description: Often volunteers to help others (parents, teachers, other children)

variable.name: stq21
variable.description: Thinks things out before acting

variable.name: stq22
variable.description: Steals from home, school or elsewhere

variable.name: stq23
variable.description: Gets along better with adults than with other children

variable.name: stq24
variable.description: Has many fears, is easily scared

variable.name: stq25
variable.description: Shows good attention span, sees chores or homework through to the end

variable.name: stq26
variable.description: Do you think that your child has difficulties in one or more of the following areas: emotions, concentration, behaviour or being able to get on with other people?

variable.name: stq27
variable.description: Do you think that your child has difficulties in one or more of the following areas: emotions, concentration, behaviour or being able to get on with other people? How long have these difficulties been present?

variable.name: stq28
variable.description: Do you think that your child has difficulties in one or more of the following areas: emotions, concentration, behaviour or being able to get on with other people? Do these difficulties upset or distress the child?

variable.name: stq29
variable.description: Do you think that your child has difficulties in one or more of the following areas: emotions, concentration, behaviour or being able to get on with other people? Do these difficulties interfere with your child's everyday life in peer relationships?

variable.name: stq30
variable.description: Do you think that your child has difficulties in one or more of the following areas: emotions, concentration, behaviour or being able to get on with other people? Do these difficulties interfere with your child's everyday life in classroom learning?

variable.name: stq31
variable.description: Do you think that your child has difficulties in one or more of the following areas: emotions, concentration, behaviour or being able to get on with other people? Do these difficulties put a burden on you or the class as a whole?
